column4: Latest; Battambang: Officials from CMAC uncovered more unexploded ordnance at 8:30 pm on February 4
column5: located at the west bank of the Sangker River in  Sangkat Svay Por
column6: Battambang City.------Work is currently being done along the river bank in preparation for the River Festival. The munitions will be detonated in a controlled explosion this afternoon. ------KOHSANTEPEAP
